name: eldmeldmressn

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, cdm(cres(c1, csn(c0))), cin(csn(c0), cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
stmt.pretty: eleq2s(c0, dom((c1 |` { c0 })), ({ c0 } ⋂ dom(c1)), c0 ∈ dom(c1))

body.origin:

comment: An element of the domain (of a relation) is an element of the domain of the restriction (of the relation) to the singleton containing this element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)
